tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE documentation (
    doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    doc_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    doc_content TEXT,
    doc_created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE documentation (doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
issue_name VARCHAR(255),
description TEXT,
author VARCHAR(50),
created_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE runbooks (runbook_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
issue_name VARCHAR(255),
steps TEXT,
author VARCHAR(50),
created_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE troubleshooting (troubleshoot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
issue_name VARCHAR(255),
details TEXT,
resolution TEXT,
created_by VARCHAR(50),
created_at TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE documentation (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255), content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)
